domain.name: Abomination
entries: You seek to instill abhorrence and horror in those around you.

domain.name: Air
entries: You can control winds and the weather.

domain.name: Ambition
entries: You strive to keep up with and outpace the competition.

domain.name: Change
entries: You can restructure the physical and metaphysical.

domain.name: Cities
entries: You have powers over urban environments and denizens.

domain.name: Cold
entries: You control ice, snow, and freezing temperatures.

domain.name: Confidence
entries: You overcome your fear and project pride.

domain.name: Creation
entries: You have divine abilities related to crafting and art.

domain.name: Darkness
entries: You operate in the darkness and take away the light.

domain.name: Death
entries: You have the power to end lives and destroy undead.

domain.name: Decay
entries: You have the power to spoil and deteriorate matter.

domain.name: Delirium
entries: You can bring about hallucinations and restlessness.

domain.name: Destruction
entries: You are a conduit for divine devastation.

domain.name: Dreams
entries: You have the power to enter and manipulate dreams.

domain.name: Dust
entries: You have the power to dry and crumble what opposes you.

domain.name: Duty
entries: You defend oaths and carry out your divine missions with great dedication.

domain.name: Earth
entries: You control soil and stone.

domain.name: Family
entries: You aid and protect your family and community more effectively.

domain.name: Fate
entries: You see and understand hidden inevitabilities.

domain.name: Fire
entries: You control flame.

domain.name: Freedom
entries: You liberate yourself and others from shackles and constraints.

domain.name: Glyph
entries: You wield power over written words and symbols.

domain.name: Healing
entries: Your healing magic is particularly potent.

domain.name: Indulgence
entries: You feast mightily and can shake off the effects of overindulging.

domain.name: Introspection
entries: You guide others in examining their lives, emotions, and motivations to ultimately become a truer version of themselves—a difficult and often painful process.

domain.name: Knowledge
entries: You receive divine insights.

domain.name: Lightning
entries: You control electricity, thunder, and storms.

domain.name: Luck
entries: You're unnaturally lucky and keep out of harm's way.

domain.name: Magic
entries: You perform the unexpected and inexplicable.

domain.name: Metal
entries: You manipulate flexible, mutable metal. Few deities possess the metal domain, apart from the two elemental lords of metal.

domain.name: Might
entries: Your physical power is bolstered by divine strength.

domain.name: Moon
entries: You command powers associated with the moon.

domain.name: Naga
entries: Like the serpentine nagas, you're in tune with cosmic forces that {@deity Ravithra} once controlled.

domain.name: Nature
entries: You hold power over animals and plants.

domain.name: Nightmares
entries: You fill minds with horror and dread.

domain.name: Pain
entries: You punish those who displease you with the sharp sting of pain.

domain.name: Passion
entries: You evoke passion, whether as love or lust.

domain.name: Perfection
entries: You strive to perfect your mind, body, and spirit.

domain.name: Plague
entries: You wield disease and pestilence like a weapon.

domain.name: Protection
entries: You ward yourself and others.

domain.name: Repose
entries: You ease mental burdens.

domain.name: Secrecy
entries: You protect secrets and keep them hidden.

domain.name: Sorrow
entries: You have a painful connection to melancholy and sadness.

domain.name: Soul
entries: You wield power over the spiritual.

domain.name: Star
entries: You command the power of the stars.

domain.name: Sun
entries: You harness the power of the sun and other light sources, and punish undead.

domain.name: Swarm
entries: You exert control over masses of creatures.

domain.name: Time
entries: You reign over the flow of time.

domain.name: Toil
entries: This domain is chosen by devotees who work constantly and refuse to let anything stand in their way.

domain.name: Travel
entries: You have power over movement and journeys.

domain.name: Trickery
entries: You deceive others and cause mischief.

domain.name: Truth
entries: You pierce lies and discover the truth.

domain.name: Tyranny
entries: You wield power to rule and enslave others.

domain.name: Undeath
entries: Your magic carries close ties to the undead.

domain.name: Vigil
entries: You watch over those long passed and guard their secrets.

domain.name: Void
entries: You draw power from emptiness.

domain.name: Water
entries: You control water and bodies of water.

domain.name: Wealth
entries: You hold power over wealth, trade, and treasure.

domain.name: Wood
entries: You command the indomitable power of wood.

domain.name: Wyrmkin
entries: You draw on the power of dragons, linnorms, and other powerful reptilian creatures.

domain.name: Zeal
entries: Your inner fire increases your combat prowess.
